mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT menus.id AS id, name, menus.pid AS pid, type FROM role_perm_assoc RIGHT JOIN menus ON role_perm_assoc.mid = menus.id WHERE EXISTS ( SELECT * FROM user_role_assoc WHERE user_role_assoc.uid = #{uid} AND user_role_assoc.rid = role_perm_assoc.rid ) ORDER BY pid ASC, type ASC
